aircraft.value: Mantis Recon - AC-3543-531 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Structural fatigue crack at stress point. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 27/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 29/09/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 29/09/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 01/10/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 02/10/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
